thread.title: A film with a social message
thread.title_full: A film with a social message - The Times of India

author: Janani Karthik
title: A film with a social message
text:
The shooting of Marainthirunthu Paarkum Marmam Enna is currently proceeding in the city at a brisk pace. The film has a bunch of newcomers with Sharanya Ponvannan, JD Chakravarthy, Radharavi and Manobala playing key roles. Dhruva and Aishwarya Dutta play the lead roles in this film, which is being directed by Rakesh.
Talking about the film, Rakesh says, "Apart from the regular love track the film has a social message for women. We have thrown light on the topic â€” safety for women in public places and how they can protect themselves from the evils in the society. We have been shooting only in the city so far."
